April 28, 1957 D York & District BBA Contest (1st Section)
York & District BBA Contest (1st Section) 10 Test Piece Contest York & District BBA Contest york-district-bba-contest-1st-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Co-operative Hall, York March contest - 1st York Railway Inst, 2nd Hessle B.L., 3rd Horbury Victoria. Hymn tune contest - 1st Hessle B.L., 2nd Rowntrees, 3rd Wetherby. 1st contest organised by York and District BBA. 11 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2013, 9:06 p.m. Aug. 12, 2013, 9:15 p.m.
